text: Clan 'Aarna is a branch of Clan [['Aashta]] of House [[Tharashk]]. Generally, the 窶連ashta have no great love of subterfuge, but when they need to act with discretion, they turn to the 窶連arna. While they are just as aggressive as the 窶連ashta, the 窶連arna love intrigue and fighting with words as well as blades.
title: 'Aarna
